desc: Class 2B: Motor cycles with an engine capacity not exceeding 200cc.
Class 2A: Motor cycles with an engine capacity between 201 cc and 400cc.
Class 2: Motor cycles with an engine capacity exceeding 400cc.
Class 4: Heavy Motor cars and Motor Tractors > 2500 kg.
Class 5: Motor Vehicles not constructed to carry any load and the unladen weight > 7250 kg.
